siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Spring is in the air and Jon is itching to get out and start lawn work. Stan asks about this years lawn strategy and how Jon will start off the spring. We were sad to miss Fenker this week, since Stan doesn’t like recording with multiple people in the room. Finally…

frontmatter.title: Getting Ready for Spring Lawn Care
tags: life with a twist of lemon
